author: KermitAI
description: AutoTrigger cog that automatically responds to configured keywords with customizable responses. Supports exact matches and wildcards.
install_msg: Thanks for installing AutoTrigger! Use `[p]help autotrigger` to see available commands. For support, please visit https://discord.gg/xXqT7gbS5H.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores trigger keywords and responses configured by server administrators. No personal data is stored.
